import React from 'react' import 'bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css'; import MediaQuery from 'react-responsive' import { Link} from 'react-router-dom' const SectionThree = ({data,myRef,blog}) =>{ const { id, classOne_description, classOne_text, classOneLink, classOne_image, classTwo_description, classTwo_text, classTwoLink, classTwo_image, } = data return(

{classOne_description}

{classOne_text}

{classTwo_description}

{classTwo_text}

{text_2}

{ blog.map((blog,index) =>{ const {name} = blog console.log(technologyBlog) if(name === technologyBlog){ return( ) } }) }
) } export default SectionThree
